channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Anthropic Is Letting Social Workers From Hundreds Of Government Agencies Use Its AI For Paperwork
item.description: The AI juggernaut is working with Founders Fund-backed startup Binti in its first foray into government social work.

item.title: One Of Europe’s Top Tech Investors Is Heading To Silicon Valley
item.description: John Doran, who led TCV's European investments, has relocated to the Bay Area to bolster the $22 billion growth equity fund’s team.

item.title: This AI-Fueled Startup Is Helping Attorneys Find New Class Action Lawsuits
item.description: Darrow is striking it rich by scouring the internet for corporate misdeeds. But one of its revenue sources—sharing legal awards—raises ethical concern...

item.title: Updated Carbon Law Reveals: Emissions Must Drop 12% Per Year
item.description: According to the Swedish NGO, Klimatkollen´s updated Carbon Law, global emissions must now drop by 12 % annually, not as previously calculated 7 %, du...

item.title: Microsoft Confirms Emergency Windows Update—Your PC ‘Might Fail’
item.description: This is critical — update your device now.
